魥魥魥

魥字的基本解释

魥
jì
〔白魥〕即“白鳍豚”，如“洞庭湖中有魥魥，稍类江豚而大过之，重者每一二千斤。”

魥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiè］
［《廣韻》去劫切，入業，溪。］
风干的鱼。
[②]［jì］
同“鱀1”。
即白鱀豚。

魥字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　魥； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1465第26
【廣韻】五合切【集韻】鄂合切，?音礏。魚名。又【廣韻】去劫切【集韻】乞業切，?音怯。以竹貫魚爲乾。出復州界。【類篇】枯魚也。

魥字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
魥字的起名意思

暂无。

魥
Basic explanation of words
魥
jì
〔白魥〕 means "white fin porpoise", such as "Dongting Lake has a finless porpoise, which is slightly larger than the finless porpoise, and the heavier one is two thousand catties."
魥
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiè］
["Guangyun" go to robbery and cut, enter the industry, stream. ]
Air-dried fish.
[②]［jì］
Same as "鱀1".
The baiji dolphin.
魥
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　魥; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1465 Page 26
【Guangyun】Five-joint cut 【Jiyun】Ehe-joint cut,? Yin 礏. The name of the fish. [Guang Yun] went to Jieqie [Jiyun] to beg for business, and sound cowardly. Take bamboo fish as dry. Out of Fuzhou. [Classes] Dry fish also.
魥

魥
Name meaning
Nothing.
